name: FunnyJunk tweaked - No Thumbs
description:
A very conservative tweak of FunnyJunk. I made it a bit more modern and minimalistic. 
Replaces thumbs with up and down rounded-edge triangular arrows.
additional_info:
-Removed all rounded corners.
-Set all fonts to sans-serif.
-Removed "Click to expand" button that appears when the sidebar is collapsed.
-FJ logo
-Upload button
-Search button
-Top menu bar (when logged in): background, vertical alignment of menu items
-Prev/Next/Random/Thumb Up/Down/Favorite/Comment/Refresh Comments buttons. Reduced number of colors used, especially consolidated all greens into a single green.
-Changed green color of total thumbs number.
-Changed thumb up and down icons for both content and comments.
-Changed the darkness of the "dimmer" that darkens the rest of the site when you open the active alerts box.
-In NSFW, removes message about porn video era.
-Moved "Recommend Tags" button so it doesn't overlap with next/thumb buttons for low-height content.
